description: This procurement is for the supply and delivery of 469 compact refrigerators.
full_summary:
===============

**Tender Title:**
.W0107-23JW14 Compact Refrigerators Request for Proposal

**Amended Tender Announcement:**
We hereby issue this amended tender announcement to clarify the submission deadline. Please disregard the original closing time posted on Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00 EST on February 2, 2023. Any bids received after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

**Tender Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the supply and delivery of 469 compact refrigerators to the Department of National Defence, Garrison Petawawa.

**Key Tender Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, open tender with bid evaluation based on technical merit and price.
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender complies with the following international and regional trade agreements:
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Delivery:** Petawawa, Ontario
* **Expected Contract Term:** February 1, 2023 to March 31, 2023

For more detailed information, please visit the tender notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15090516?extsite=MTUwOTA1MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

**Submission Guidelines:**
All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00 EST on February 2, 2023. We encourage all interested suppliers to review the tender notice and submission guidelines carefully before preparing their proposal.

Contact Information:
Wayne Cook (SPAC/PSPC)
wayne.cook@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*Note: Contact information may be subject to change. Please verify
